featured.text: The story about Hou-I shooting down nine suns is a well-known Chinese _____, but it may not be a true historical event.

definition.zh_def: 後，指時間或空間上的後面或之後。
definition.en_def: A term indicating a position or time that comes after something else.
definition.example: We will meet at the park after lunch, so I will see you then, hou.
